text: Clarence Alexander Avant (February 25, 1931 - August 13, 2023) was an American music executive, entrepreneur, and movie producer. He was sometimes known as the "Godfather of Black Music". He was born in Climax, North Carolina. He founded Sussex Records on December 18, 1969. In October 2016, Avant received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. Avant died at his home in Los Angeles, California on August 13, 2023 at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Music Industry Veteran Clarence Avant on Working with Bill Withers Category:1931 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Businesspeople from North Carolina Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:American record producers
title: Clarence Avant
